pkmkdoc.description: Installs the Sphero SDK frameworks and project templates for use in Xcode

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1138\cocoasubrtf320 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Welcome to the Sphero Xcode 4 template installer for iOS\ \ This installer will automatically add the Sphero project template to Xcode so that it appears as an option when creating a new project.\ \ NOTE: This template will only work with versions of Xcode 4, it is not compatible with Xcode 3.\ \ For help or detailed instructions please visit \ http://developer.gosphero.com\ }
